remarks: Value of the scalar product with a Hilbert space functional. (Contributed by NM, 23-May-2006.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2014.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
hfmmval $p |- ( ( A e. CC /\ T : ~H --> CC ) -> ( A .fn T ) = ( x e. ~H |-> ( A x. ( T ` x ) ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d T x $.
